tool_description: Over 100 000 of famous quotes, over 1000 categories. This API enables random bulk return of quotes. Quotes are categorized by categories.
name: Quotes API
title: Quotes API

api_list.name: Get Random Quotes
api_list.description:
Get multiple random quotes from chosen category or send **all** to get results from multiple categories.
You can view all categories through the Category endpoint.
By default it will return the 10 quotes but you can give query parameter **count**  with the maximum value of 50.

api_list.name: List all Categories
api_list.description: List out all available categories of quotes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotes-api10.p.rapidapi.com/api/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotes-api10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quotes-api10.p.rapidapi.com/api/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotes-api10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
